fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Once per game, fill every Pale Moon member's house with balloons, including yours.
-Once per game, eat a candy.
-Transport two players with balloons.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Filling houses with balloons grants every Pale Moon including yourself Invincible Defense, but lowers their attack value to None
-Eating a candy grants you Powerful defense.
-Once the PMCS begins, you gain 2 uses of filling houses with balloons. If you fill houses with balloons, all visitors of the filled are dealt a Powerful attack. Additionally, the players whose houses have been filled Attack Values are upped to Powerful.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
"You have decided to fill all of the Pale Moons houses with balloons."
"You have decided to eat your candy."
"You have decided to transport Player Name A and Player Name B."
"You were granted Invincible Defense and None/Basic Attack by the Clown!"
"You ate your candy, giving you powerful defense."
"You attached balloons to Player Name A and Player Name B, transporting them." (Target receives normal transport msg)
"The Pale Moon Circus Show has begun. Test out those new balloons!"
